item.title: 5 Steps to Frictionless AI
item.description: It has been a decade since Harvard Business Review called Data Scientist the sexiest career in the 21st Century. The companies who grabbed onto these talents have not only transformed but completely disrupted the status quo in the data & analytics industry. Much of this hype was initially driven by big tech giants (FAANG, or MAANG circa Nov 2021), but there has been an explosion of high-performing AI teams popping out of every corner of the world.
